mapper.select: SELECT n.noticeid, n.title, a.admin_name, n.writeday, n.rnum, n.img, n.content FROM notice n INNER JOIN admin a ON n.admin_name = a.admin_name ORDER BY n.noticeid DESC LIMIT #{index}, 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, memberid, writeday, rnum, img, content) VALUES (#{title}, #{memberid}, NOW(), #{rnum}, #{img}, #{content})
